Metadata.Title: Fanatic Panic
Metadata.Description: Daniel Samper is a defected CIA agent who plans to sell government secrets to the highest bidder. James King is both a super fan of Craig Blacks book series and also an online predator. Sadly, we've had a hard time pinning James for any crimes due to his late fathers connections with the New York DA. The plan; dispatch of Daniel Samper and make James King go down for the crime. This needs to look like the workings of a fanatical serial killer, as such, this will sadly require "colateral damage".
